articles.title: Somebody tell Ken Burns there are free-roaming bison in Utah - Salt Lake Tribune
articles.description: “The American Buffalo” is a gem of a documentary from filmmaker Ken Burns. But it does seem that his long and expansive research never reached Utah.
articles.content:
The American Buffalo is a two-part, four-hour gem of a documentary that tells the story of the bison and the people who revered them. Its another masterpiece from filmmaker Ken Burns.
